title: Week Template
---

# Week Template

Use this template for each week page.

## Goal (Measurable Objective)

Define one measurable result for the week.

- Learner action: `[[what the learner will do]]`
- Evidence target: `[[what must be submitted]]`
- Success threshold: `[[score, count, or quality target]]`

## Competency Gate

State the gate this week supports.

- Gate name: `[[gate name]]`
- Gate outcome: `[[observable competency]]`

## Competencies

- `[[competency 1]]`
- `[[competency 2]]`
- `[[competency 3]]`

## Concepts

- `[[concept 1]]`
- `[[concept 2]]`
- `[[concept 3]]`

## Labs

1. `[[lab 1 title + expected output]]`
2. `[[lab 2 title + expected output]]`

## Build Assignment

Describe a concrete assignment with constraints and acceptance criteria.

- Scope: `[[in-scope work]]`
- Constraints: `[[time/tools/data constraints]]`
- Output: `[[what must exist by end of week]]`

## Deliverables

- `[[deliverable 1]]`
- `[[deliverable 2]]`
- `[[deliverable 3]]`

## Rubric Summary

Reference the primary rubric and scoring emphasis.

- Rubric page: `[[rubrics/...]]`
- Weighted focus: `[[top criteria + weights]]`

## Pass Criteria (Competency Gate)

- Minimum weighted score: `[[e.g., 80/100]]`
- Critical criteria floor: `[[e.g., no score below 2]]`
- Required deliverables submitted and reviewable

## Hours

Estimated effort: `[[min-max hours]]`.

## Ship Checklist

- [ ] Assignment scope completed
- [ ] Deliverables uploaded and named correctly
- [ ] Self-score completed against rubric
- [ ] Competency gate pass criteria verified
